charger.trait: Obtain 1 DP after this unit defeats an enemy; Refunds the original DP Cost when retreated

tactician.trait: This unit can designate one Tactical Point within attack range to call Reinforcements; ATK is increased to 150% when attacking enemies blocked by Reinforcements

bearer.trait: Cannot block enemies during the skill duration

instructor.trait: Can attack enemies from range; When attacking enemies not blocked by self, increase ATK to 120%

lord.trait: Can launch Ranged Attacks that deal 80% of normal ATK

musha.trait: Can't be healed by other units. Recovers 30/50/70 (scales with elite promotion) self HP every time this operator attacks an enemy

fearless.trait: Blocks 1 enemy and ignores the Deployment Limit, but has a long Redeployment Time

reaper.trait: Cannot be healed by allies; Attacks deal AOE Damage; Recovers 50 HP for every enemy hit during attacks, up to Block count

librator.trait: Normally does not attack and has 0 Block; When skill is inactive, ATK gradually increases up to +200% over 40 seconds. ATK is reset when the skill ends

protector.trait: Blocks 3 enemies and ignores Deployment Limit, but has a long Redeployment Time

guardian.trait: Can heal allies by using skill(s)

artsprotector.trait: Normal attacks deal Arts damage while the skill is active

duelist.trait: Only restores SP when blocking enemies

fortress.trait: Prioritize Long range splash attack (splash radius of 1.0 tiles) when not blocking

fastshot.trait: Attacks aerial enemies first and ignores Deployment Limit, but has a long Redeployment Time

aoesniper.trait: Deals AOE Physical damage with a splash radius of 1.0 tile

longrange.trait: Prioritizes attacking the enemy with lowest DEF within range first

reaperrange.trait: Attacks all enemies within range, and deals 150% damage to enemies in the row directly in front of this unit.

bombarder.trait: Attacks deal two instances of Physical damage to ground enemies in a 0.9 tile area (The second instance is a shockwave that has half the normal ATK)

splashcaster.trait: Deals AOE Arts damage with a splash radius of 1.1 tiles

funnel.trait: Controls a Drone that deals Arts damage; When the Drone continuously attacks the same enemy, its damage will increase (from 20% up to 110% of the operator's ATK, linearly)

phalanx.trait: Normally does not attack, but has +200% DEF and +20 RES; When skill is active, attacks deal AoE Arts damage

mystic.trait: Attacks deal Arts damage; When unable to find a target, attacks can be stored up and fired all at once (Up to 3 charges)

chain.trait: Attacks deal Arts damage and jump between 3 (4 at Elite 2) enemies (jump range is 1.7 tiles). Each jump deals 15% less damage and inflicts an 80% Slow for 0.5 seconds

blastcaster.trait: Deals AOE Arts damage in a long line

physician.trait: Restores the HP of allies and ignores the Deployment Limit, but has a long Redeployment Time

ringhealer.trait: Restores the HP of 3 allies simultaneously

healer.trait: Has a large healing range, but the healing amount on farther targets is reduced to 80%

wandermedic.trait:
Restores the HP of allies
Recovers Elemental damage equal to 50% of Attack Power
(Can heal Elemental damage of unhurt units)

slower.trait: Deals Arts damage and Slows the target by 80% for 0.8 seconds

bard.trait: Does not attack but continuously restores the HP of all allies within range (the HP restored per second is equal to 10% of self ATK). Self is unaffected by Inspiration

blessing.trait: Deals Arts damage; When skill is active, attacks instead restore the HP of allies (heal amount is equal to 75% of ATK)

summoner.trait:
Deals Arts damage
Can use Summons in battles

craftsman.trait: Blocks 2 enemies; Can use <Support Devices> in battles

executor.trait: Does not attack and ignores the Deployment Limit, but has a long Redeployment Time

pusher.trait:
Can attack all blocked enemies
Can be deployed on Ranged Tiles

stalker.trait:
Deals Damage to all targets within range
50% chance to dodge Physical and Arts attacks and is less likely to be targeted by enemies

hookmaster.trait:
Can Shift enemies by using skills
Can be deployed on Ranged Tiles

geek.trait: Continually loses 3% max HP per second

merchant.trait: Has reduced Redeployment Time, but DP Cost is not refunded upon retreating; While deployed, 3 DP are consumed every 3 seconds (automatically retreats without sufficient DP)

traper.trait: Can use traps to assist in combat, but traps cannot be placed on tiles already occupied by an enemy

dollkeeper.trait: Does not retreat upon receiving lethal damage, instead swaps to a <Substitute> (Substitute has 0 Block). Swaps back to the original after 20 seconds

incantationmedic.trait: Attacks deal Arts damage and heal the HP of an ally within Attack Range for 50% of the damage dealt

agent.trait: Has reduced Redeployment Time, can use ranged attacks

shotprotector.trait: Blocks 3 enemies and attacks from long range.

chainhealer.trait: Restores HP of allies, bouncing between 3 allies. Healing reduced by 25% per bounce.

ritualist.trait: Deal arts damage, can inflict elemental damage

hunter.trait: Consumes bullets for attacks, increases attack power to 120%. Slowly reloads bullets when not attacking (up to 8 bullets)

primcaster.trait: Deal arts damage, can inflict elemental damage

loopshooter.trait: Can only attack when holding boomerangs (boomerangs take time to return)
